text:
I would recommend this company and their Extra Virgin Coconut Oil to anyone. The product arrived at the direct time specified which is always a plus in my book. I love the way it smells and I use it to cook with as well as in my hair. I would definitely order from this company again and have recommended it to all of my friends that use Extra Virgin Coconut Oil as well.

Don't ever stop making this great product. I will be ordering some more really soon.......
